message: This message is to inform you that iQIES will be unavailable from Thursday, April 13, 2023 from 8 PM EDT to Monday, April 17, 2023 8 AM EDT, for scheduled maintenance.

An issue has been identified within MDS where assessments submitted as the second modification (X0800=2) are being incorrectly rejected as a duplicate assessment (edit -1007).  The first modification assessment should be accepted. To avoid rejected assessments, providers should withhold submitting a second assessment modification until this issue can be corrected.  If you suspect that a modification assessment was incorrectly rejected, you will need to resubmit once this issue has been resolved.
